T input (std::string prompt)
 checks that response was received from cin.

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class InputValidator< T >

Template Parameters:
T is the type of input to look for
T must provide the equality operator This is error prone with doubles so some external checks are in order

template<typename T>
T InputValidator< T >::input ( std::string  prompt  )  [inline]

checks that response was received from cin.

input() presents a prompt and returns response.

Parameters:
prompt is a string to present before reading
Returns:
response

template<typename T>
T InputValidator< T >::guardedInput ( std::string  prompt,
std::string  reprompt,
T  guard 
) [inline]

guardedInput presents a prompt and ensures some new information was given. Allows a custom reprompt.

Parameters:
prompt is the string to present prior to input
reprompt is a corrective hint
guard is a known bad value that should not be set
Postcondition:
response is not guard.
Returns:
response
